title: Moms stage mass breastfeeding to fight climate change
text:
Mothers from all over the UK gathered in Parliament Square on Wednesday as the Extinction Rebellion happening around the world entered its third day. The movement describes itself as a "peaceful nonviolent disruption" calling for immediate action on global climate change and wildlife emergencies.

Hundreds of women breastfed their babies outside of Downing Street, begging and pleading for change to happen on behalf of their children.

"I'm here because I need to protect her future," one mother said.

Watch the clip above to learn more about the Extinction Rebellion and the protest.
description: Mothers from all over the UK gathered in Parliament Square on Wednesday as the Extinction Rebellion happening around the world entered its third day.
